chargeHist.descr: Drive or Operate Vehicle w/o Consent

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:49 AM Defendant Brandon Lee Strickland appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Rock in court for Brandon Lee Strickland.  Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls cases 21CF155, 22CF98, 2CF128 & 22CF239
Atty Rock does not represent def on case 22CF239
DA is being heard on bond
Atty Rock is being heard
Court is being heard regarding 21CF155 - Jury Trial and PTC already scheduled
22CF239, 22CF98 & 22CF128 - already scheduled
11:07 AM
Letter to Commissioner requesting adjournment - Adjournment request APPROVED by CC

Defendant Brandon Lee Strickland appeared by video, in custody at MCJ. Attorney Stephanie Rock in court for Brandon Lee Strickland.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
3:13 p.m.
Court calls 22CF98, 22CF128 and 22CM19.
Court addresses status of cases:
22CM19 is currently just riding along
22CF128 is scheduled for arraignment today
22CF98 has not had a prelim yet.
Arraignment as to 22CF128:
Copy of Information.
Atty Rock waives reading.
Enters not guilty pleas.
Court proposes scheduling prelim on 22CF98 and STC on 22CF128 and 22CM19.
Attys agree.
Atty Rock waives time limits on prelim.
Court instructs clerk to remove Atty Spansail as atty of record on 22CF128.
3:17 p.m.
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Letter to Judge from Atty Obear re: rescheduled hearing
Letter to Judge re: scheduling - Reschedule approved by CC Kallgren 8-11-22

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Adjustment Number: 22A 002868,
Payable Number: 90839,
Receipt Number: 22R 004713,
Amount: $20.00

3:46 PM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brandon Lee Strickland in court.  Attorney Jon G Spansail in court for Brandon Lee Strickland. 
w/22CF98, 22CF128, 22CM19
Atty Spansail - not yet appointed on 22CM19.
Court heard on prelim today - only hearing prelim on 22CF128 today.
Atty Spansail heard - Deft is in process of retaining Atty O'Bear, requests continuance of prelim hrg.
DA responds.
Court heard - court notes indicate same thing was previous told in court.
Deft heard on contact w/Atty O'Bear and retainer contact, made payment today.
Atty Spansail reviews contract on Defts phone - informs court it is a retainer contract.
3:54 pm court recesses - DA Morrow calls Atty O'Bear's office.
4:02 pm recess concludes.
DA heard on contact w/O'Bear's office - no payment has been received nor has a signed agreement been submitted.
Atty Spansail heard - Deft believes his father made payment.
Court heard - moves forward w/prelim today, since no other counsel has been retained.
Atty Spansail heard - client wishes to waive prelim, provides form, satisfied client understands.
Court reviews form w/Deft.
Deft waives prelim.
Court finds Deft freely waives and binds over for trial.
Court schedules w/parties.
4:09 pm
Arraignment scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

10:00 AM Defendant Brandon Lee Strickland in court.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Spansail appears in court with the deft.
Court calls cases 22CF98, 22CF128, and 22CM19.
DA heard - Atty Spansail has not been assigned on 22cf98 yet.
Atty Spansail heard - deft has told him that he may be hiring private counsel.
Atty Spansail heard on 22cf128 - has reviewed complaint with deft.
Deft understands charges and penalties.
Waives formal reading.
Requests prelim.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
10:04 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
8:52 AM Defendant Brandon Lee Strickland appeared by video, in custody and with Atty Spansail.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Spansail appears for bond purposes only.
Deft understands charges and max penalties.
DA heard on bond recommendation.
Atty Spansail heard.
Court heard and imposes $5000 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances without a valid Rx, no contact with R.M., D.T., Ueros Automotive in Grand Chute or Randy's Tire in Green Bay.
Court schedules with parties.
9:00 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.
